mapper.select: select o.orderseq, o.orderdate, b.name as Lunchname, b.pic as Lunchpic, b.category as LunchCategory, p.periodshipseq, p.shipdate, p.shiptime, p.shipperiod, p.dayperweek from tblOrder o inner join tblOrderCart t on o.orderseq = t.orderseq inner join tblCart c on t.cartseq = c.cartseq inner join tblPeriodShip p on c.periodshipseq = p.periodshipseq inner join tblSellBoard s on c.sellboardseq = s.sellboardseq inner join tblLunchboxSet l on s.sellboardseq = l.sellboardseq inner join tblLunchBox b on l.lunchboxseq = b.lunchboxseq where o.id = #{id}
select * from tblorder where id = #{id} order by orderseq desc

select o.orderseq, o.orderdate, o.price as orderPrice, o.couponseq, t.cnt, a.*, s.sale, s.pic, l.name, l.category, l.price, l.pic from tblOrder o inner join tblOrderCart c on o.orderseq = c.orderseq inner join tblCart t on c.cartseq = t.cartseq inner join tblAddress a on o.addressseq = a.addressseq inner join tblSellBoard s on s.sellboardseq = t.sellboardseq inner join tblLunchboxSet x on x.sellboardseq = s.sellboardseq inner join tblLunchbox l on x.lunchboxseq = l.lunchboxseq where o.id=#{id} order by o.orderseq desc

select w.*, t.name as lunchname, t.pic as lunchpic from tblWishList w inner join tblSellBoard s on w.sellboardseq = s.sellboardseq
inner join tblLunchboxSet x on s.sellboardseq = x.sellboardseq inner join tblLunchBox t on x.lunchboxseq = t.lunchboxseq where w.id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from tblWishList where wishlistseq = #{wishlistseq} and id=#{id}
